name: Greninja & Froakies Deck
author: Werd Web Dev
description: Epic Duelsâ€“compatible deck for Greninja and his Froakies minions.

cards.name: Water Dash
cards.rulesText: Move Greninja up to 3 spaces; enemies passed through take 1 damage.

cards.name: Mist Veil
cards.rulesText: Greninja becomes invisible until he attacks or is adjacent to an enemy; draw 1 card.

cards.name: Surprise Strike
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy, then shift Greninja 1 space.

cards.name: Shadow Retreat
cards.rulesText: After Greninja is attacked, move him 2 spaces and the attacker discards 1 card.

cards.name: Hydro Cannon
cards.rulesText: Range 3: Deal 4 damage to one target or 2 damage to up to three targets.

cards.name: Freezing Torrent
cards.rulesText: Range 2: Deal 2 damage and Slow the target (they lose 1 action next turn).

cards.name: Aerial Flip
cards.rulesText: Leap over an adjacent enemy, swap spaces, and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Silent Snipe
cards.rulesText: Range 4: Deal 3 damage; if Greninja was unseen, deal +2 damage.

cards.name: Smoke Bomb
cards.rulesText: Cancel an attack that targets Greninja; then move him 1 space.

cards.name: Grand Water Spiral
cards.rulesText: Signature: Range 2, 5 damage, push the target 2 spaces, then Greninja moves 2 spaces.

cards.name: Bubble Barrage
cards.rulesText: Each Froakie adjacent to an enemy deals 1 damage and pushes that enemy 1 space.

cards.name: Leap Away
cards.rulesText: Each Froakie may move 2 spaces and may pass through enemies.

cards.name: Tadpole Tactics
cards.rulesText: Choose a Froakie; it absorbs the next 2 damage dealt to Greninja this turn.

cards.name: Ninja Amphibian Assault
cards.rulesText: Team-Up: Greninja and all Froakies move 2; Greninja deals 3 damage to one enemy; each Froakie deals 1 to a different adjacent enemy.
